system.description: The Dark Eldar feeds on the pain of their enemies, channeling it into a furious assault that makes them an unstoppable force in combat.
system.benefit: If the character has gained at least 1 Pain Token during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the Berserk Charge Talent and Brutal Charge Traits for the rest of the encounter. Berserk Charge: When using the Charge Action, gain +20 to WS instead of the usual +10 Brutal Charge: Deals 3 extra damage with attacks made while charging.
system.notes: Requires spending Fate Point and 1+ Pain Tokens

specialAbilities.name: Pain-Fueled Fury
specialAbilities.description: Spend a Fate Point when you have 1+ Pain Tokens to gain Berserk Charge (+20 WS on Charge instead of +10) and Brutal Charge (+3 damage on Charge attacks) for the rest of the encounter.
